mapper.select: SELECT PRODUCT_NO, PRODUCT_NAME, SAVE_MONEY, SUPPORTER, ID, DEADLINE, GOAL_MONEY, CONTENT, REGION, (SELECT TRUNC(DEADLINE) - TRUNC(SYSDATE) FROM FUNDING_OPEN WHERE PRODUCT_NO = 1) AS D_DAY FROM FUNDING_OPEN WHERE PRODUCT_NO = #{product_no}
SELECT REWARD_NAME FROM FUNDING_REWARD WHERE PRODUCT_NO = #{product_no}
SELECT REWARD_PRICE FROM FUNDING_REWARD WHERE PRODUCT_NO = #{product_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FUNDING_OPEN (PRODUCT_NO, PRODUCT_NAME, ID, DEADLINE, GOAL_MONEY, CONTENT, REGION, PIMG_NO) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(PRODUCT_NO),0)+1 FROM FUNDING_OPEN), #{product_name}, #{id}, #{deadLine}, #{goal_money}, #{content}, #{region}, #{fileName})
INSERT INTO FUNDING_REWARD VALUES ((SELECT NVL(MAX(PRODUCT_NO),0)+1 FROM FUNDING_REWARD), #{reward_name}, #{reward_price}, (SELECT NVL(MAX(REWARD_NO),0)+1 FROM FUNDING_REWARD))
mapper.select: SELECT PAY_NO, CHOICE_REWARD, TOTAL_SUM, TO_CHAR(PAY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD(DY) AM HH:MI:SS') PAY_DATE FROM FUNDING_PAY WHERE ID = #{id} ORDER BY PAY_DATE DESC
